title: Music Favorites in Different UK Cities
summary: This article talks about the favorite music artists in big UK cities in 2025. It uses data from Spotify and YouTube to show which singers and bands people listen to most. For example, Oasis is very popular in Scotland, and Sam Fender is loved in Newcastle. Taylor Swift and Drake are top artists on Spotify in many places, but Sam Fender beats them in Newcastle. On YouTube, Eminem is number one in most cities. The article also mentions surprises, like Lady Gaga being popular in Belfast and Chris Brown having fans in Birmingham. It shows that people often like artists from their own hometowns, and there are differences between northern and southern cities in music tastes. This helps us see how music brings people together and varies by location.

background_read: Music is a big part of our lives, and people all over the world enjoy listening to different artists. In the UK, cities like Manchester, Newcastle, and Belfast have their own favorite singers and bands. Apps like Spotify and YouTube help track what music is popular. This article looks at data from 2025 to see which artists are loved in each city, showing how music tastes can vary by location and sometimes surprise us with local favorites.
Article_Structure: WHO: Music fans in UK cities like Scotland, Newcastle, and Belfast
WHAT: Their favorite artists in 2025, based on Spotify and YouTube data
WHERE: In over a dozen big UK cities
WHY: To show how music tastes differ by place and highlight local favorites

perspectives.description: The article shows that even with different favorites, music is a shared interest across cities.
